org.xmlcml.cml.base
Class CMLSerializer

java.lang.Object
  nu.xom.Serializer
      org.xmlcml.cml.base.CMLSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CMLConstants, EuclidConstants
public class CMLSerializer
extends nu.xom.Serializer
implements CMLConstants

Serializer for customising CML output

This allows (a) writing to a String (b) customising elements and attributes Still experimental

Version:
5.0
Author:
Peter Murray-Rust
